cards.name: Fumar
cards.description: Fumar is an adorable, pint-sized creature found in volcanic regions. With its unique Heat Ray and Nudge abilities, it spends its days lounging on hot rocks and enjoying the warmth of its natural habitat. It is quick to make friends with nearby Pokémon, and while it can be shy at first, its playfulness and charm won't be denied!
cards.image_prompt: Fumar::0 a chibi young fire-type pokemon, in a volcano environment, blue and red ambient lighting, anime chibi drawing style, pastel background --niji --ar 3:2

cards.name: Armoryne
cards.description: Armoryne is a resilient pokemon, able to withstand the intense heat and molten energy of its volcanic home. It is adorned in ornate armor that gives it a regal air, and allows it to bravely stand guard over its roost. Though seemingly inactive during the day, on a still night one can see it gathering its energy and releasing it in fierce fire storms, igniting the landscape with bursts of light and heat.
cards.image_prompt: Armoryne::0 a fire-type pokemon::1.8, wearing ornate armor, in a volcano environment, lava texture background, anime sketch with watercolor --niji --ar 3:2

cards.name: Armortron
cards.description: Armortron is a legendary pokemon that is a sight to behold. Its gigantic, armored body stands tall among the burning embers of its volcano home. Its thick armor is etched with ornate patterns that glimmer in the light of the flames. Its two unique abilities, Combustion and Smack, offer protection and power over its environment. When the heat of the day builds, Armortron can be found strolling among its rocky terrain, surveying its domain and ensuring its safety.
cards.image_prompt: Armortron::0 a massive legendary fire-type pokemon::2.5, wearing ornate armor, in a volcano environment, orange galaxy background, polished final by studio ghibli --niji --ar 3:2
